kg_Spin_Button_description: Click to start a game at the current bet value.
kg_Stop_Button: Click to start a game at the current bet value.
kg_Stop_Button_description: Click to stop the game round.
kg_Turbo_Mode_description: Click to turn turbo mode on or off.
kg_Autoplay_description: Click to choose the number of Autoplay rounds and advanced Autoplay settings.
kg_Total_Bet_description: Click + and - to change total bet.
kg_Menu_description: Click to access the game setting and game information.
kg_Game_History_description: Click to view your latest game history. The game history available only when playing for money.
kg_Bet_Settings_description: Click to view the bet settings menu.
kg_Rules_description: Click to view the game rules.
kg_Paytable_description: Click to view winning combinations and payouts.

kg_Buy_Time_description: Click to purchase internet time. 10 minutes = 1.00 usd.
wild_symbol_feature: WILD SYMBOLS substitute for all symbols except Scatter symbols.
scatter_symbol_feature: 3, 4 or 5 Scatters start the Bonus Game with 5, 7, 9 Free Spins respectively.
MINI_PAYTABLE_SCATTER_DESCRIPTION:
3 OR MORE SYMBOLS
ACTIVATE FREE SPINS
MINI_PAYTABLE_WILD_DESCRIPTION:
SUBSTITUTES FOR ALL
SYMBOLS EXCEPT SCATTER
3_OR_MORE:
3 OR MORE SYMBOLS
ACTIVATE FREE SPINS
3_4_or_5_Scatters:
3, 4 or 5 Scatters start the Bonus Game with 5, 7, 9 Free Spins respectively.
During the Bonus Game the middle reel contains only X3-X25 WILD MULTIPLIER SYMBOLS.
Free Spins are played with the Total Bet of triggering game.
3_4_or_5_Scatters_part_1: 3, 4 or 5 Scatters start the Bonus Game with 5, 7, 9 Free Spins respectively.
3_4_or_5_Scatters_part_2:
During the Bonus Game the middle reel contains only X3-X25 WILD MULTIPLIER SYMBOLS.
Free Spins are played with the Total Bet of triggering game.
All_prizes_are_for_combinations:
All prizes are for combinations of a kind. All prizes are for
combinations left to right, except scatters. All prizes are on lines,
except scatters. Scatter symbols pay at any position on screen.

Highest win only paid on each line and per scatter combination.
Scatter wins and line wins are added. The paytable always shows
the prizes for the currently selected bet.

All game outcomes are independent and randomly determined.
Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
